name: Zombie Breakout
description:
Use the left mouse button to launch the ball. A and D keys will move the paddle.

Zombies are coming, and they will walk in the path to richochet your ball! Try to destroy all the bricks. Be careful as the zone beyond your paddle will destroy you ball and you will lose a life!

Credits:

A Game Made by Nich Mebane for Ludum Dare 41

Zombie Asset by tigertowel on BlendSwap
Car Asset by piopis on BlendSwap
Font is Southern Aire Font by Mano Grback | https://www.mansgreback.com/

Thanks to all LD participants and organizers!
